trends: There has been one other sighting in Bilzen
There were no other sightings in Bilzen on or around January 9th 1996
divs: Sighting Details IT WAS ALMOST DARK AND A FRIEND AND I were goingto the carting please when we ride near the football place that leays near aforest I SAW SOMETHING IN THE AER IS WAS BIG A TRIANGLE WITH 3 (ORANGE YELLOWRED)all in one LIGHTS AND IT WAS BUZZING BUD FOR 5-10 MIN IT STAYED STILL ANDSUDDEN IT FLEW AWAY WITH A FAST SPEED BUT MAKING NO NOICE. SINCE THAT TIME IAMVERY INTERESTED IN INFORMATION ABOUT UFO LEARNING ABOUT THEM AND EVERY THING BUTNOW I REPORTED BECAUSE I HAVE SEEN THE SAME OBJECT IN THE BOOK Het Geheim BoekUfo and now IAM SURE OF WHAT I HAVE SEEN.
